TEXT.P1: At the intersection of frontend development, design, and didactics lies the most exciting space for me: where structure meets aesthetics and systems become understandable. This connection drives me to create solutions that are clear, modular, and sustainable.
TEXT.P2: I see challenges as learning moments. Every new task sharpens my eye for architecture, performance, and user experience. Precision, clarity, and a conscious approach to complexity shape my work.
TEXT.P3: Good products emerge through collaboration — and that’s exactly where I feel most at home. Let’s build something together that truly makes an impact!

PROJECTS.HEADLINE: Projects
PROJECTS.INTRO: The following projects showcase different approaches to building responsive, user‑friendly applications with clear structure and efficient code. All examples can be explored directly in the browser and tried out interactively.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: A task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Tasks can be created, organized, and managed via drag‑and‑drop. Users and categories can be assigned flexibly. With Supabase integration, real‑time team collaboration becomes possible.

POLLO.TITLE: El pollo loco
POLLO.DESCRIPTION: A jump‑and‑run game built with object‑oriented principles. The character collects coins and Tabasco bottles to stand up to the crazy hen. Animations, collision detection, and interactions are fully implemented in JavaScript.

DABUBBLE.TITLE: DABubble
DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: A communication platform inspired by Slack. The application offers an intuitive interface, real‑time messaging, and clearly structured channel organization. The goal is efficient, team‑oriented collaboration in modern work environments.

CARD1.QUOTE: "Working with them was a pleasure. Their dedication to quality and collaboration elevated our team's performance and project outcomes."
CARD1.NAME: Liam Smithy

CARD2.QUOTE: "Their structured approach and attention to detail took our project to the next level. Collaboration was consistently productive and inspiring."
CARD2.NAME: Julia Meinhardt

CARD3.QUOTE: "A real talent when it comes to making complex topics understandable. Technically strong, communicative, and always solution‑oriented."
CARD3.NAME: Carlos Rivera

SKILLS.HEADLINE: Skills
SKILLS.INTRO: My focus lies in developing structured, maintainable, and efficiency‑driven frontend solutions. I place great importance on clear architectural principles, clean code, and a continuous improvement process to integrate new technologies and methods into existing workflows in a meaningful way.

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Ready for a new project together?
CONTACT.TEXT:
Openness to new projects and professional collaboration is at the core of my work. I am particularly interested in roles that require structured frontend development, clean architecture, and a reliable commitment to quality. Through technical expertise and continuous improvement, I contribute sustainably to modern teams and projects.

For project inquiries, professional exchange, or concrete ideas, the contact form provides a direct way to get in touch. Responses are timely and focused.

CONTACT_FORM.CONSENT_TEXT: I have read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data for handling my request.

DESCRIPTION.LABEL: Description
DESCRIPTION.TEXT: A task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Tasks can be created, organized, and managed via drag‑and‑drop. Users and categories can be assigned flexibly. With Supabase integration, real‑time team collaboration becomes possible.

IMPLEMENTATION.LABEL: Implementation Details
IMPLEMENTATION.TEXT: Teamwork is at the heart of this project — not only in the intended use of the application but also in the development process itself. Clear task distribution combined with mutual support and regular feedback was essential. Personally, I really enjoyed creating something big together.

DESCRIPTION.LABEL: Description
DESCRIPTION.TEXT: A jump‑and‑run game built with object‑oriented principles. The character collects coins and Tabasco bottles to stand up to the crazy hen. Animations, collision detection, and interactions are fully implemented in JavaScript.

IMPLEMENTATION.LABEL: Implementation Details
IMPLEMENTATION.TEXT: The main challenge in this project was the object‑oriented structure and implementing the game mechanics in pure JavaScript. It became clear how important upfront planning is, especially regarding class relationships and communication between components. Developing and testing the game logic repeatedly was both insightful and fun.

DESCRIPTION.LABEL: Description
DESCRIPTION.TEXT: A communication platform inspired by Slack. The application offers an intuitive interface, real‑time messaging, and clearly structured channel organization. The goal is efficient, team‑oriented collaboration in modern work environments.
